channel.title: Comments on: Him We Proclaim-Preaching Christ From all the Scriptures

item.title: By: Kipp Soncek
item.dc:creator: Kipp Soncek
item.description: I am currently reading this book and it has been a tremendous blessing. Part hermeneutics, part homiletics, this book not only discusses things at the theoretical level but also examines some of the methods employed by the likes of Jay Adams and Tim Keller, as well as giving some "sample" sermon outlines which employ the hermeneutic espoused. A very practical book, and one that has borne immediate fruit in my ministry.
item.content:encoded: I am currently reading this book and it has been a tremendous blessing. Part hermeneutics, part homiletics, this book not only discusses things at the theoretical level but also examines some of the methods employed by the likes of Jay Adams and Tim Keller, as well as giving some “sample” sermon outlines which employ the hermeneutic espoused. A very practical book, and one that has borne immediate fruit in my ministry.
